sentences.en: Excessively long fall distances are required for drops of raindrop size to attain terminal velocity.
sentences.cn: 雨滴为了得到足够的末速度必须下降很长距离.

sentences.en: Have you ever had the sensation of falling through infinite space, shattering, crumbling, of being about to disappear like a raindrop into the ocean?
sentences.cn: 不知道你曾否有过这样的感受：掉进了一个没有边际的空间里面，不断地破碎，变成小块，好像雨滴落入大海那样的慢慢消失？

sentences.en: Inside a bowling alley : Please be quiet, we need to hear raindrop.
sentences.cn: 在保龄球馆: 保持安静, 我们需要倾听大头针落地.

sentences.en: Its lens, nobigger than a small raindrop, magnified objects hundreds of times.
sentences.cn: 它的镜头大不过小雨滴，却能使物体放大数百倍。

sentences.en: Little cookie unfolds her colorful umbrella hurriedly in order to block the raindrop.
sentences.cn: 哗啦啦,小饼干赶紧撑起小花伞,这才挡住了小雨点.

sentences.en: Mr. Raindrop, falling away from me now.
sentences.cn: 雨滴先生, 现在离我而去了.

sentences.en: My hands reached out , catching nothing but a raindrop, on a leaf that had withered.
sentences.cn: 妾触手可及, 唯雨滴耳, 落于飘零之黄叶.

sentences.en: My hands reached out, catching nothing a raindrop, on a leaf that had withered.
sentences.cn: 妾伸手欲触, 无他, 但枯叶一雨滴耳.

sentences.en: My hands, catching nothing but a raindrop, on a leaf that had withered.
sentences.cn: 我伸出双手, 却杳不可及, 唯有残逝的叶子上的一滴雨水.

sentences.en: None of the substances would serve as the center of a snow crystal or raindrop.
sentences.cn: 那些物质都不能构成雪的结晶或雨点的核心.

sentences.en: The raindrop falls on my face.
The raindrop was beating against the windowpanes.
The raindrop whispered to the jasmine, " Keep me in your heart for ever. "
sentences.cn: 雨点向茉莉花微语道: “ 把我永久地留在你的心里吧. ”

sentences.en: The raindrop, humidified vapor or liquid usually contain minerals that erode the precision parts instrument.
sentences.cn: 雨水 、 湿气、和液体含有矿物质,会腐蚀精密部件.

sentences.en: The tribo - surface produces electrical pitting and appears local fusion and molten raindrop metallic grain splashed af.
sentences.cn: 载流条件下,摩擦表面发生电点蚀,并出现局部熔化和雨滴状金属颗粒.

sentences.en: Then something - a pebble, a raindrop - breaks the surface and shatters the mirror.
sentences.cn: 接着,什么东西打破了镜面,是一颗鹅卵石, 或者是一滴雨水.

trans.tran_en: A raindrop is a single drop of rain
